answers.answer: No, that doesn't sound particularly diabetes related. Typical symptoms of diabetes are increased thirst and urination, sometimes increased hunger, fatigue and weight loss. She should see her doctor to see what might be going on with her; it might be physical and it might also be emotional (such as depression).

question: I have a friend that has lately been suffering headaches, has had altered sleep patterns, many changes in moods and  faints alot.She is quite fit for age but would this symptoms be diabetic related???
title: Would this be diabetes?
